001
002package com.commercetools.api.models.product;
003
004import java.time.LocalDate;
005import java.time.LocalTime;
006import java.time.ZonedDateTime;
007import java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter;
008import java.util.*;
009import java.util.stream.Collectors;
010
011import com.commercetools.api.models.common.LocalizedString;
012import com.commercetools.api.models.common.Reference;
013import com.commercetools.api.models.common.TypedMoney;
014import com.commercetools.api.models.product_type.AttributeLocalizedEnumValue;
015import com.commercetools.api.models.product_type.AttributePlainEnumValue;
016
017/**
018 * Accessor for retrieving type safe attribute values
019 */
020public class AttributeAccessor {
021    public static Map<String, Object> asAttributeMap(final ProductVariant variant) {
022        return variant.getAttributes().stream().collect(Collectors.toMap(Attribute::getName, Attribute::getValue));
023    }
024
025    public static Map<String, Attribute> asMap(final ProductVariant variant) {
026        return asMap(variant.getAttributes());
027    }
028
029    public static Map<String, Attribute> asMap(final List<Attribute> attributes) {
030        return attributes.stream().collect(Collectors.toMap(Attribute::getName, attribute -> attribute));
031    }
032
033    public static LocalDate asDate(final Attribute attribute) {
034        Object value = attribute.getValue();
035        if (value instanceof LocalDate) {
036            return (LocalDate) value;
037        }
038        return LocalDate.parse((String) value, DateTimeFormatter.ISO_LOCAL_DATE);
039    }
040
041    public static LocalTime asTime(final Attribute attribute) {
042        Object value = attribute.getValue();
043        if (value instanceof LocalTime) {
044            return (LocalTime) value;
045        }
046        return LocalTime.parse((String) value, DateTimeFormatter.ISO_LOCAL_TIME);
047    }
048
049    public static ZonedDateTime asDateTime(final Attribute attribute) {
050        Object value = attribute.getValue();
051        if (value instanceof ZonedDateTime) {
052            return (ZonedDateTime) value;
053        }
054        return ZonedDateTime.parse((String) value, DateTimeFormatter.ISO_ZONED_DATE_TIME);
055    }
056
057    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
058    public static List<LocalDate> asSetDate(final Attribute attribute) {
059        return ((List<Object>) attribute.getValue()).stream().map(value -> {
060            if (value instanceof LocalDate) {
061                return (LocalDate) value;
062            }
063            return LocalDate.parse((String) value, DateTimeFormatter.ISO_LOCAL_DATE);
064        }).collect(Collectors.toList());
065    }
066
067    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
068    public static List<LocalTime> asSetTime(final Attribute attribute) {
069        return ((List<Object>) attribute.getValue()).stream().map(value -> {
070            if (value instanceof LocalTime) {
071                return (LocalTime) value;
072            }
073            return LocalTime.parse((String) value, DateTimeFormatter.ISO_LOCAL_TIME);
074        }).collect(Collectors.toList());
075    }
076
077    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
078    public static List<ZonedDateTime> asSetDateTime(final Attribute attribute) {
079        return ((List<Object>) attribute.getValue()).stream().map(value -> {
080            if (value instanceof ZonedDateTime) {
081                return (ZonedDateTime) value;
082            }
083            return ZonedDateTime.parse((String) value, DateTimeFormatter.ISO_ZONED_DATE_TIME);
084        }).collect(Collectors.toList());
085    }
086
087    public static String asString(final Attribute attribute) {
088        return (String) attribute.getValue();
089    }
090
091    public static Boolean asBoolean(final Attribute attribute) {
092        return (Boolean) attribute.getValue();
093    }
094
095    public static Double asDouble(final Attribute attribute) {
096        return (Double) attribute.getValue();
097    }
098
099    public static LocalizedString asLocalizedString(final Attribute attribute) {
100        return (LocalizedString) attribute.getValue();
101    }
102
103    public static AttributePlainEnumValue asEnum(final Attribute attribute) {
104        return (AttributePlainEnumValue) attribute.getValue();
105    }
106
107    public static AttributeLocalizedEnumValue asLocalizedEnum(final Attribute attribute) {
108        return (AttributeLocalizedEnumValue) attribute.getValue();
109    }
110
111    public static Long asLong(final Attribute attribute) {
112        return (Long) attribute.getValue();
113    }
114
115    public static Reference asReference(final Attribute attribute) {
116        return (Reference) attribute.getValue();
117    }
118
119    public static TypedMoney asMoney(final Attribute attribute) {
120        return (TypedMoney) attribute.getValue();
121    }
122
123    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
124    public static List<String> asSetString(final Attribute attribute) {
125        return (List<String>) attribute.getValue();
126    }
127
128    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
129    public static List<Boolean> asSetBoolean(final Attribute attribute) {
130        return (List<Boolean>) attribute.getValue();
131    }
132
133    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
134    public static List<Double> asSetDouble(final Attribute attribute) {
135        return (List<Double>) attribute.getValue();
136    }
137
138    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
139    public static List<LocalizedString> asSetLocalizedString(final Attribute attribute) {
140        return (List<LocalizedString>) attribute.getValue();
141    }
142
143    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
144    public static List<AttributePlainEnumValue> asSetEnum(final Attribute attribute) {
145        return (List<AttributePlainEnumValue>) attribute.getValue();
146    }
147
148    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
149    public static List<AttributeLocalizedEnumValue> asSetLocalizedEnum(final Attribute attribute) {
150        return (List<AttributeLocalizedEnumValue>) attribute.getValue();
151    }
152
153    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
154    public static List<Long> asSetLong(final Attribute attribute) {
155        return (List<Long>) attribute.getValue();
156    }
157
158    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
159    public static List<Reference> asSetReference(final Attribute attribute) {
160        return (List<Reference>) attribute.getValue();
161    }
162
163    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
164    public static List<TypedMoney> asSetMoney(final Attribute attribute) {
165        return (List<TypedMoney>) attribute.getValue();
166    }
167
168    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
169    public static List<Attribute> asNested(final Attribute attribute) {
170        return (List<Attribute>) attribute.getValue();
171    }
172
173    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
174    public static List<List<Attribute>> asSetNested(final Attribute attribute) {
175        return (List<List<Attribute>>) attribute.getValue();
176    }
177}
